body: Why do I get the feeling she looked like a loli in those last few pages?

Few problems i have with this story. For one they are married right? But sleep in seperate beds? and they haven't had sex until now? also she acts like she has never had sex but there is no defloration tag these types of stories you always like to see that the FMC is a virgin but doesn't seem the case here. Then the ending comes and she wakes up. was the whole thing a dream? Are they married or not? Maybe i'm just to picky but i like my stories to make a bit of sense.
